Package org.tsugi.base

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseContext
    This is a class to provide access to the resource context level data.
    BaseDatabase
    The base implementation for the Database interface
    BaseKey  
    BaseLaunch
    The base implementation for the Launch interface While each implementation may have its own configuration options, all implementations handle the following configuration:
    BaseLink
    The base implementation for the Link interface
    BaseOutput
    The base implementation for the Output interface
    BaseResult
    The base implementation for the Result interface
    BaseService
    The base implementation for the Service interface
    BaseSettings
    The base implementation for the Settings interface
    BaseTsugi
    The base implementation for the Tsugi interface This contains things like OAuth handling that will likely be common across lots of implementations independent of persistence implementation.
    BaseUser
    The base implementation for the User interface
